name: Merge Master - Dinosaurs fight
description:
Use your wits to combine insects & fight against enemies! Control merge arena!

Merge Master: Insect Fusion is a real-time strategy game. You need to think fast to beat all the enemies by combing your insects on your battlefield.

Quickly synthesize your insects into giant monsters. The higher the level of the monster, the stronger the attack and defense. This is the most important skill in this game, please master it

The final boss is coming after merging all your warriors! Choose the right combination, arrange the best position, and defeat the strongest opponent together!



Game Features:

1.Addictive gameplay and 3D graphs.

2.Easy to learn, hard to master.

3.Perfect for insect lovers.
